tool_description: Deploy AI-Powered modules to prevent payment fraud
title: Greip

api_list.name: /BINLookup
api_list.description: This method helps you validate any BIN/IIN number and retrieve the full details related to the bank, brand, type, scheme, country, etc.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: bin
parameters.description: The BIN/IIN you want to lookup/validate.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

utterances.utterance: Can you validate the BIN number 489022 using my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899?
Please lookup the details for BIN 489022 with my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899.
Validate BIN 489022 and retrieve its full details using API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899.
Can you check the BIN 489022 with my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and return the response in JSON format?
Lookup BIN 489022 using API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and provide details about the bank and country.
Validate BIN 489022 with API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and retrieve information about the brand and scheme.
Can you validate BIN 489022 using my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and return the response in JSON format?
Please lookup BIN 489022 with API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and provide details about the type and country.
Validate BIN 489022 using API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and retrieve information about the bank and scheme.
Can you lookup BIN 489022 with my API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and return the response in JSON format?

api_list.name: /badWords
api_list.description: badWords endpoint: Detects whether user inputs contain profanity or not.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text you want to check.
parameters.default: This is a sample text without profanity!

parameters.name: scoreOnly
parameters.description: Set to `yes` to return only the score of the text and whether it's safe or not.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

parameters.name: listBadWords
parameters.description: Set to `yes` to list the bad-words as an Array.

utterances.utterance: Check if the text 'This is a clean sentence.' contains any profanity.
Detect bad words in the text 'What the hell is going on?' and return only the score.

parameters.text: What the hell is going on?

utterances.utterance: Analyze the text 'You are an idiot!' for profanity and list the bad words.
Check the text 'This is a sample text without profanity!' for inappropriate language.

parameters.text: This is a sample text without profanity!

utterances.utterance: Verify if the text 'Damn, that was unexpected!' contains any bad words.
Check the text 'This is a test message.' for profanity and return the response in JSON format.
Detect profanity in the text 'Shut up!' and list the bad words.
Check if the text 'This is a harmless sentence.' contains any bad words and return only the score.
Analyze the text 'What the f*** is this?' for profanity.
Check the text 'This is a clean message.' for inappropriate language and return the response in JSON format.

api_list.name: /validatePhone
api_list.description: This method can be used as an extra-layer of your system for validating phone numbers.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format of the country code of the phone number.

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: The Phone Number you want to validate.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

Is the phone number 5551234567 valid in Germany?

Validate the phone number 1234567890 for Australia.

Check if the phone number 1234567890 is valid in India.
Validate the phone number 1234567890 for China.

api_list.name: /BulkLookup
api_list.description: BulkLookup endpoint: Returns the geolocation data of multiple IP Addresses.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: ips
parameters.description: The IP Addresses you want to lookup. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The modules you want to use of the request. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Used to inform the API to retrieve the response in your native language.

Fetch geolocation data for the IP addresses 192.168.1.100, 10.0.0.2 using the API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and include currency details.
Lookup the IPs 8.8.4.4, 4.2.2.2 with the API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and retrieve the response in Spanish.
Get geolocation details for the IP addresses 203.0.113.1, 198.51.100.2 using the API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and return the response in XML format.
Fetch geolocation data for the IPs 172.16.254.2, 192.0.2.2 with the API key 2517bc4fc3f790e8f09bc808bb63b899 and include currency information.

api_list.name: /IPLookup
api_list.description: Returns the geolocation data of a specific IP Address.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: The IP Address you want to lookup.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The modules you want to use of the request. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Used to inform the API to retrieve the response in your native language.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Used to inform the API to retrieve the response in your native language.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.

parameters.name: params
parameters.description: The modules you want to use of the request. It's a CSV (Comma Separated Values)

api_list.name: /ASNLookup
api_list.description: ASNLookup endpoint: This method helps you lookup any AS Number. It returns the type, organisation details, routes, etc.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Your API Key. Each user has a unique API Key that can be used to access the API functions. If you don't have an account yet, please create new account first.

parameters.name: asn
parameters.description: The AS Number you want to lookup

parameters.name: isList
parameters.description: Set this to true if you want to list all routes of both IPv4 and IPv6.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Sets the format of the API response. JSON is the default format.
